Config.General.AlwaysAvailable.Name: Books Always Available
Config.General.AlwaysAvailable.Descripti: If enabled, all books will always be available from the bookseller without the need to meet certain requirements.
Config.General.Enabled.Name: Enabled
Config.General.Enabled.Description: If disabled, this book and its powers will not be available.
Config.General.Price.Description: The price of this book when bought directly from a shop and not earned through other means. Integer values only.
Config.Luck.Bonus.Name: Luck Bonus
Config.Luck.Bonus.Description: The amount added to your daily luck value.
Config.ExtraGifts.Bonus.Name: Weekly Gift Limit
Config.ExtraGifts.Bonus.Description: How many gifts this book will allow you to give to someone in the same week.
Config.ArtisanMachines.GrangeMustWin.Des: If enabled, your grange display must place 1st as well as include 6+ artisan goods.
Config.ArtisanMachines.Bonus.Name: Machine Speed Bonus
Config.ArtisanMachines.Bonus.Description: Percent decrease to the processing time of machines producing artisan goods.
Config.GiantCrops.Bonus.Name: Giant Crop Chance
Config.GiantCrops.Bonus.Description: The percent chance that crops will become a giant crop overnight.
Config.Optimization.Bonus.Name: Extra Experience
Config.QiNotebook.Bonus.Name: Qi Gem Chance
Config.QiNotebook.Bonus.Description: Percent chance that a Qi Gem will drop in addition to the usual odds.
Config.CheatCodes.Requirement.Name: Junimo Kart Deaths Required
Config.CheatCodes.Requirement.Descriptio: The number of times you must die in Junimo Kart before the Secret Codes book becomes available.
Config.CheatCodes.Bonus.Name: Extra Lives
Config.CheatCodes.Bonus.Description: The number of extra lives you start with in Junimo Kart progress mode.
Config.JunimoScrap.Chatter.Name: Junimo Chattiness
Config.JunimoScrap.Chatter.Description: How often the Junimos will have speech bubbles appear over their heads. Higher numbers mean more chatter.
Config.JunimoScrap.RandomItems.Name: Random Junimo Items
Config.JunimoScrap.RandomItems.Descripti: If enabled, you can receive a completely random item in the mail from your Junimos. This may possibly give you items that you are not supposed to obtain and is just for fun. Enable at your own risk.
Config.Carols.Bonus.Name: Shop Discount
Config.Carols.Bonus.Description: The percent discount applied to shop prices.
Config.Coffee.Bonus.Name: Coffee Multiplier
Config.Coffee.Bonus.Description: The multiplier applied to the duration of Coffee and Triple Shot Espresso.
